thread.title: AP Poll: Majority Of Americans Worried About Loss Of Health Care Coverage
thread.title_full: AP Poll: Majority Of Americans Worried About Loss Of Health Care Coverage

author: Allegra Kirkland
title: AP Poll: Majority Of Americans Worried About Loss Of Health Care Coverage

organizations.name: associated press-norc center for public affairs research

text:
A majority of Americans are concerned that many will lose health care coverage if the Affordable Care Act is repealed and few want to see it stricken from the books immediately, according to a poll published Friday by the Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research.
